thumb.title: Taste of my Tears / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Magic Paper Airplane ー魔法の紙飛行機ー一つの大きな物語を音楽、映像、言葉によって表現するプロジェクト、またその物語の名称。 https://tsukkunn13.wixsite.com/m-p-a ＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿ ■Music & 3D Movie Direction つっくん / tsukkunn13 □X https://twitter.com/tsukkunn13 ■Vocal 初音ミク ＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿ Now you make it vivid I’ma make vague Then you call it dull Then I call it softIs it how it works? It is how we workIn the comfort zone In the right positionNow you like how I’m beautiful but you won’t know what I’m really forI got sick of what you’ve been asking forI got sick of that you’ve been playing on meTruth or Dare I will not choose dareShall we talk how you are treating me And looking me with disdain?“We went too far”No I wanna go moreKnew all when I asked you love or hateAnd you smiled at me insteadSo sorry for making you unhappyI feel like left right and up and go roundTaste of my tearsNo you don’t care about me being happyI feel like left right and up and down for eternityLet me danceDon’t wanna let you goLet me singDon’t wanna be freeLet me dance till the end
